<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 7"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Fabricated Connections](/Feats.aspx?ID=1938) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 167 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Dandy](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=55)

**Prerequisites**
[Dandy Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1935); Master in [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5)

</column>

---

You can lie about having taken an action so convincingly that you acquire all the tangible benefits of having successfully completed it. You can roll [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) in place of a different skill when attempting to [Earn Income](/Actions.aspx?ID=23), [Make an Impression](/Actions.aspx?ID=50), [Request](/Actions.aspx?ID=51), or [Subsist](/Actions.aspx?ID=27). You can use Fabricated Connections to Make an Impression or Request once per day, and you can also use it once per week to Earn Income or Subsist.
name: Fabricated Connections
